lines.text: I gotta wonder... what's up with the walls of a <c=#FF0000>Portable Hole?</c>
Like, it makes a hole in whatever, but does it look like something was cut away?
Because if it's just folding space, and not actually making anything disappear... what would the sides look like?
No, sorry, I got that backwards. Pointless question. What's that got to do with anything?
Maybe the boundary of one of those holes is super flammable, or something? I dunno.
Aren't you the magic expert, here?
Not on this magic. I don't go in for that class-based stuff. Too restrictive.
No point to reading up on spells you're never gonna cast, right?
That is what usually stops people from readin' about magic in general, yeah.
Because it's illegal. In case you forgot.
Yeah, yeah. People are boring, more at eleven.
